‚Ä¶ by The Strip for a workout.  The facility is perfectly located, well equipped and clean.  The bathrooms have shower facilities and towels for members!  WOD is always solid, friendly coach and welcoming community.  I'll be back....again!

‚Ä¶ . The coach was great and went through motions and warm-up in great detail. I was able to do 7am class, get back to hotel, shower, check-out and off to airport by 9am. They have nice shower facilities which I'll use next time. Nice ‚Ä¶
Great place to workout 10mins off the strip. Pros include: water, shower, towels, AC. Trainer Kandice was assisting for drop in lile myself

showerReviews.reviewText: No private showers and the showers they do have only have cold water with the exception of 2. One is moderately warm. The other is hot but doesn't stay on for more than 5 seconds before you need to hit the button again and there's no shower ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I would also like to note it is 2023, there is absolutely no need for an old WW2 style shower room. I understand it is 18 + in the men‚Äôs lock room, but every YMCA I have been too outside Vegas has stalls for privacy, store your bar of soap ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ been to. Clean with lots of amenities and friendly staff. Has even steam room, sauna, and a rock climbing wall. Couldn‚Äôt figure out how to get warm water from the shower but eh. It‚Äôs in the middle of the desert I can handle a cold shower

‚Ä¶ on select members. Soon I wont have to deal with the discrimination I experience when I'm here and will go to the other locations. The only good thing is that this one provides both big and small towels which is good if you want to shower.
